body_html:
I feel safer with the previous implementation you had of the torch.Size constructor. It was limited to the signature of tuple.

I'm also not sure we want to do this change to PythonArgParser. There is an issue Greg was referring to where a single integer scalar can't be converted to IntList but the problem is limited to this line:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/utils/python_arg_parser.cpp#L105
